definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name of Hebrew origin, traditionally associated with the third son of Adam and Eve in the Bible, and later used as a personal name in various cultures.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自希伯来语的男性名字，传统上指《圣经》中亚当和夏娃的第三个儿子，后在多种文化中被用作人名。
definitions.example_en: Seth was the only one who remembered the old traditions.
definitions.example_cn: 只有塞特还记得那些古老的传统。
